content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":252472,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、それはウルザがなんとかすると言っていたぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, Urza said he would do something about it."},{"lineNumber":252473,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの子がなんとかすると言っているんだ、大丈夫だろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"That kid said he’d handle it, so it should be fine."},{"lineNumber":252474,"originalJapaneseLine":"連絡が来るまで、少しでも魔物を減らしておくか。","translatedEnglishLine":"Until we get word, let’s try to reduce the number of monsters as much as we can."},{"lineNumber":252475,"originalJapaneseLine":"とランスは出かける。","translatedEnglishLine":"And with that, Rance sets out."},{"lineNumber":252476,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景：ゼス平原／危険or戦場","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: Zeth Plains / Danger or Battlefield"},{"lineNumber":252477,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達はスリミドの南西、サンデー平原に来ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and his group had arrived at the Sunday Plains, southwest of Surimido."},{"lineNumber":252478,"originalJapaneseLine":"今、ゼス主力軍と魔軍が１番激しく戦っている戦場だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"This is the battlefield where the Zeth main forces and the demon army are fighting most fiercely right now."},{"lineNumber":252479,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここにハニー達数万が魔軍側で参加してきた","translatedEnglishLine":"Here, tens of thousands of the Honeys have joined on the demon army’s side."},{"lineNumber":252480,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場は混戦状態","translatedEnglishLine":"The battlefield is in a chaotic state."},{"lineNumber":252481,"originalJapaneseLine":"カバッハーン、サイアス、ウスピラが戦っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kabahan, Saius, and Uspira were fighting."},{"lineNumber":252482,"originalJapaneseLine":"さらに毛利軍も参加している、ハニーは我々に任せろ、割りまくるぜと","translatedEnglishLine":"Moreover, the Mouri army is also participating; the Honeys said, 'Leave it to us, we’ll break through like crazy.'"},{"lineNumber":252483,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス、よーし、俺達も参加するぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance: Alright, let’s join in too."},{"lineNumber":252484,"originalJapaneseLine":"やっぱ、ハニーより魔物将軍を倒す。","translatedEnglishLine":"After all, it’s better to defeat the monster generals than the Honeys."},{"lineNumber":252485,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうですね、ランス様は敵のボスを倒していかないと","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s right, Lord Rance has to defeat the enemy bosses."},{"lineNumber":252486,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーは割ってもオマケが無いからな、魔物将軍は割ったら女の子がくくくく","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if you break through the Honeys, there’s no extra reward; but if you defeat a monster general, you get girls, hehe."},{"lineNumber":252487,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニー軍の陣地を発見","translatedEnglishLine":"Discovered the Honey army’s camp."},{"lineNumber":252488,"originalJapaneseLine":"はにーほー、魔軍と協力して人間をいじめるのだー","translatedEnglishLine":"Honey-ho, cooperating with the demon army to bully humans!"},{"lineNumber":252489,"originalJapaneseLine":"いじめるのだー、可哀想な娘・・うひひ","translatedEnglishLine":"Bullying them—poor girls... uhehe."},{"lineNumber":252490,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦争を楽しい遊びみたいに考えているハニー達","translatedEnglishLine":"The Honeys think of war like a fun game."},{"lineNumber":252491,"originalJapaneseLine":"うーん、あいかわらずよくわからん連中だ","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, they’re still a bunch I just don’t understand."},{"lineNumber":252492,"originalJapaneseLine":"倒しておくか","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s take them down."},{"lineNumber":252493,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"[Battle]"},{"lineNumber":252494,"originalJapaneseLine":"おっ、アタリ付き発見！","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, found one with a prize!"},{"lineNumber":252495,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍、ランスの事を知らない、わざわざやられに来たか人間どもめ","translatedEnglishLine":"Monster Great General: Don’t know who Rance is, huh? Did you come all the way here just to get killed, humans?"},{"lineNumber":252496,"originalJapaneseLine":"ん、隊列もバラバラ、服装や装備もバラバラ、お前ら正規軍ではなく野良の傭兵か","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, your formation is messy, your clothes and equipment are all over the place. You’re not regular troops but some stray mercenaries?"},{"lineNumber":252497,"originalJapaneseLine":"やめておけ、お前らでは私の相手にはならぬぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Better stop. You’re no match for me."},{"lineNumber":252498,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふん、俺様のオーラが見えぬとはランクの低い奴だな、まぁいいひとつ聞こう","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph, not being able to see my aura means you’re low rank. Well, fine, let me ask you one thing."},{"lineNumber":252499,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前の腹に入っている女の子は美人か","translatedEnglishLine":"Is the girl inside your belly a beautiful one?"},{"lineNumber":252500,"originalJapaneseLine":"ん、頭脳として入れている人間の事か、そんなのしらんわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh? You mean the human I have inside as my brain? I don’t know anything about that."},{"lineNumber":252501,"originalJapaneseLine":"まぁ、いい、割れば分かるか。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, fine. I’ll find out once I break you."},{"lineNumber":252502,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"[Battle]"},{"lineNumber":252503,"originalJapaneseLine":"ん、ここはハニー達の陣地か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, this is the Honeys’ camp..."},{"lineNumber":252504,"originalJapaneseLine":"儂は、ハニーキングが第一の盟友、関羽","translatedEnglishLine":"I am the Honey King’s foremost ally, Guan Yu."},{"lineNumber":252505,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーはごっこ遊びが好きなので、三国志ごっこ風でもいいです","translatedEnglishLine":"The Honeys like dress-up play, so playing Three Kingdoms style is fine."},{"lineNumber":252506,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、別になんでもいいです、好きにやって・・","translatedEnglishLine":"No, it doesn’t really matter, just do as you like..."},{"lineNumber":252507,"originalJapaneseLine":"で戦闘になります。（ここ　ハニーの将軍クラスです","translatedEnglishLine":"And then battle begins. (Here they are Honey-class generals.)"},{"lineNumber":252508,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"[Battle]"},{"lineNumber":252509,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれ、どうしたのですか、戦場から離れてしまいましたよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh? What’s wrong? You’ve left the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":252510,"originalJapaneseLine":"うーん、飽きた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, I’m bored."},{"lineNumber":252511,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人もいる訳じゃないし、俺で無いと駄目だという話でもないしな","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s no demon god here, and it’s not like I’m the only one who can do this."},{"lineNumber":252512,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんかやる気はなくなった。","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ve just lost my motivation."},{"lineNumber":252513,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな勝手な・・","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s so selfish..."},{"lineNumber":252514,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーども見ていたら、なんというか真面目に戦うのがバカバカしくなる","translatedEnglishLine":"Watching those Honeys, somehow fighting seriously feels ridiculous."},{"lineNumber":252515,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはわかりますが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I understand that, but..."},{"lineNumber":252516,"originalJapaneseLine":"どっちにしろあの戦場に魔物大将軍ツォトンはいない感じだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Either way, it seems the monster great general Tsoton is not on that battlefield."},{"lineNumber":252517,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう少し奥地を調べてみよう、いくぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s investigate a little farther inland. Let’s go."},{"lineNumber":252518,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘後","translatedEnglishLine":"[After Battle]"},{"lineNumber":252519,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物軍はランス達に負けて逃げて行った","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster army lost to Rance and his group and retreated."},{"lineNumber":252520,"originalJapaneseLine":"がはははは、俺様の勝利だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahaha, that’s my victory."},{"lineNumber":252521,"originalJapaneseLine":"向こうに町がありますよ、よってみよう","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s a town over there. Let’s stop by."},{"lineNumber":252522,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこは、ついさきほどまで魔軍に支配されていた町　ピーハンデル","translatedEnglishLine":"That town, Pihandel, was under demon army control until just a short while ago."},{"lineNumber":252523,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが魔物兵を倒しておっぱらったので、隠れたいた住民が出てきます。","translatedEnglishLine":"Because Rance defeated and drove away the monster soldiers, the hiding residents are coming out."},{"lineNumber":252524,"originalJapaneseLine":"住民は殺されてもおらずにみんな無事、ゆうに魔物に抵抗はしてなかった","translatedEnglishLine":"The residents were not killed and are all safe; they simply did not resist the monsters."},{"lineNumber":252525,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物は怖かったが、さからわない限り安全は保証された。","translatedEnglishLine":"They were afraid of the monsters, but as long as they didn’t resist, their safety was guaranteed."},{"lineNumber":252526,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物達は我々にこういった、ゼスの身分制度を復活させる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The monsters told us this: they will restore the Zeth caste system."},{"lineNumber":252527,"originalJapaneseLine":"優秀な者からＡ級、Ｂ級、Ｃ級と分ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"From the competent they categorize into A class, B class, and C class."},{"lineNumber":252528,"originalJapaneseLine":"この町にいた魔法使い、学者、先生などかしこい者はみんなＡ級、Ｂ級候補として","translatedEnglishLine":"The magicians, scholars, teachers, and other intelligent people from this town were all taken as candidates for A and B class."},{"lineNumber":252529,"originalJapaneseLine":"連れていかれたよ、残った俺達はＣ級だってさ","translatedEnglishLine":"They were taken away; the ones left behind like us are C class, they said."},{"lineNumber":252530,"originalJapaneseLine":"　連れていかれたのは、この先にある　町　ルールーハンデル","translatedEnglishLine":"The ones taken were taken to the town ahead, Ruluhandel."},{"lineNumber":252531,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんかやる気のない者達ばかり残っています。アホっぽい、無気力ぽい","translatedEnglishLine":"Only people without motivation remain. They seem stupid and listless."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、それはウルザがなんとかすると言っていたぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, Urza said he would do something about it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの子がなんとかすると言っているんだ、大丈夫だろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That kid said he’d handle it, so it should be fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連絡が来るまで、少しでも魔物を減らしておくか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until we get word, let’s try to reduce the number of monsters as much as we can.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とランスは出かける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And with that, Rance sets out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：ゼス平原／危険or戦場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Zeth Plains / Danger or Battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はスリミドの南西、サンデー平原に来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his group had arrived at the Sunday Plains, southwest of Surimido.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、ゼス主力軍と魔軍が１番激しく戦っている戦場だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the battlefield where the Zeth main forces and the demon army are fighting most fiercely right now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここにハニー達数万が魔軍側で参加してきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, tens of thousands of the Honeys have joined on the demon army’s side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場は混戦状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battlefield is in a chaotic state.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カバッハーン、サイアス、ウスピラが戦っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kabahan, Saius, and Uspira were fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに毛利軍も参加している、ハニーは我々に任せろ、割りまくるぜと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moreover, the Mouri army is also participating; the Honeys said, 'Leave it to us, we’ll break through like crazy.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、よーし、俺達も参加するぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance: Alright, let’s join in too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱ、ハニーより魔物将軍を倒す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After all, it’s better to defeat the monster generals than the Honeys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうですね、ランス様は敵のボスを倒していかないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s right, Lord Rance has to defeat the enemy bosses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーは割ってもオマケが無いからな、魔物将軍は割ったら女の子がくくくく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if you break through the Honeys, there’s no extra reward; but if you defeat a monster general, you get girls, hehe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー軍の陣地を発見
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Discovered the Honey army’s camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はにーほー、魔軍と協力して人間をいじめるのだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honey-ho, cooperating with the demon army to bully humans!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いじめるのだー、可哀想な娘・・うひひ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bullying them—poor girls... uhehe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争を楽しい遊びみたいに考えているハニー達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honeys think of war like a fun game.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、あいかわらずよくわからん連中だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, they’re still a bunch I just don’t understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒しておくか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s take them down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [Battle]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっ、アタリ付き発見！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, found one with a prize!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍、ランスの事を知らない、わざわざやられに来たか人間どもめ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster Great General: Don’t know who Rance is, huh? Did you come all the way here just to get killed, humans?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、隊列もバラバラ、服装や装備もバラバラ、お前ら正規軍ではなく野良の傭兵か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, your formation is messy, your clothes and equipment are all over the place. You’re not regular troops but some stray mercenaries?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やめておけ、お前らでは私の相手にはならぬぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Better stop. You’re no match for me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふん、俺様のオーラが見えぬとはランクの低い奴だな、まぁいいひとつ聞こう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, not being able to see my aura means you’re low rank. Well, fine, let me ask you one thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の腹に入っている女の子は美人か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is the girl inside your belly a beautiful one?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、頭脳として入れている人間の事か、そんなのしらんわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? You mean the human I have inside as my brain? I don’t know anything about that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁ、いい、割れば分かるか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, fine. I’ll find out once I break you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [Battle]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、ここはハニー達の陣地か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, this is the Honeys’ camp...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂は、ハニーキングが第一の盟友、関羽
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am the Honey King’s foremost ally, Guan Yu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーはごっこ遊びが好きなので、三国志ごっこ風でもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honeys like dress-up play, so playing Three Kingdoms style is fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、別になんでもいいです、好きにやって・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it doesn’t really matter, just do as you like...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で戦闘になります。（ここ　ハニーの将軍クラスです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then battle begins. (Here they are Honey-class generals.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [Battle]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれ、どうしたのですか、戦場から離れてしまいましたよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? What’s wrong? You’ve left the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、飽きた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I’m bored.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人もいる訳じゃないし、俺で無いと駄目だという話でもないしな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s no demon god here, and it’s not like I’m the only one who can do this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんかやる気はなくなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ve just lost my motivation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな勝手な・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s so selfish...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーども見ていたら、なんというか真面目に戦うのがバカバカしくなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Watching those Honeys, somehow fighting seriously feels ridiculous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはわかりますが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand that, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どっちにしろあの戦場に魔物大将軍ツォトンはいない感じだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Either way, it seems the monster great general Tsoton is not on that battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう少し奥地を調べてみよう、いくぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s investigate a little farther inland. Let’s go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [After Battle]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物軍はランス達に負けて逃げて行った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster army lost to Rance and his group and retreated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは、俺様の勝利だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha, that’s my victory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうに町がありますよ、よってみよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s a town over there. Let’s stop by.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこは、ついさきほどまで魔軍に支配されていた町　ピーハンデル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That town, Pihandel, was under demon army control until just a short while ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが魔物兵を倒しておっぱらったので、隠れたいた住民が出てきます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because Rance defeated and drove away the monster soldiers, the hiding residents are coming out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 住民は殺されてもおらずにみんな無事、ゆうに魔物に抵抗はしてなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The residents were not killed and are all safe; they simply did not resist the monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物は怖かったが、さからわない限り安全は保証された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were afraid of the monsters, but as long as they didn’t resist, their safety was guaranteed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達は我々にこういった、ゼスの身分制度を復活させる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters told us this: they will restore the Zeth caste system.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 優秀な者からＡ級、Ｂ級、Ｃ級と分ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the competent they categorize into A class, B class, and C class.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この町にいた魔法使い、学者、先生などかしこい者はみんなＡ級、Ｂ級候補として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The magicians, scholars, teachers, and other intelligent people from this town were all taken as candidates for A and B class.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連れていかれたよ、残った俺達はＣ級だってさ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were taken away; the ones left behind like us are C class, they said.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連れていかれたのは、この先にある　町　ルールーハンデル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ones taken were taken to the town ahead, Ruluhandel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんかやる気のない者達ばかり残っています。アホっぽい、無気力ぽい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only people without motivation remain. They seem stupid and listless.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

the Honeys said, 'Leave it to us, we’ll break through like crazy.'"},{"lineNumber":252483,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス、よーし、俺達も参加するぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance: Alright, let’s join in too."},{"lineNumber":252484,"originalJapaneseLine":"やっぱ、ハニーより魔物将軍を倒す。","translatedEnglishLine":"After all, it’s better to defeat the monster generals than the Honeys."},{"lineNumber":252485,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうですね、ランス様は敵のボスを倒していかないと","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s right, Lord Rance has to defeat the enemy bosses."},{"lineNumber":252486,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーは割ってもオマケが無いからな、魔物将軍は割ったら女の子がくくくく","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if you break through the Honeys, there’s no extra reward; You’ve left the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":252510,"originalJapaneseLine":"うーん、飽きた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, I’m bored."},{"lineNumber":252511,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人もいる訳じゃないし、俺で無いと駄目だという話でもないしな","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s no demon god here, and it’s not like I’m the only one who can do this."},{"lineNumber":252512,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんかやる気はなくなった。","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ve just lost my motivation."},{"lineNumber":252513,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな勝手な・・","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s so selfish..."},{"lineNumber":252514,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーども見ていたら、なんというか真面目に戦うのがバカバカしくなる","translatedEnglishLine":"Watching those Honeys, somehow fighting seriously feels ridiculous."},{"lineNumber":252515,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはわかりますが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I understand that, but..."},{"lineNumber":252516,"originalJapaneseLine":"どっちにしろあの戦場に魔物大将軍ツォトンはいない感じだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Either way, it seems the monster great general Tsoton is not on that battlefield."},{"lineNumber":252517,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう少し奥地を調べてみよう、いくぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s investigate a little farther inland. Let’s go."},{"lineNumber":252518,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘後","translatedEnglishLine":"[After Battle]"},{"lineNumber":252519,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物軍はランス達に負けて逃げて行った","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster army lost to Rance and his group and retreated."},{"lineNumber":252520,"originalJapaneseLine":"がはははは、俺様の勝利だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahaha, that’s my victory."},{"lineNumber":252521,"originalJapaneseLine":"向こうに町がありますよ、よってみよう","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s a town over there. Let’s stop by."},{"lineNumber":252522,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこは、ついさきほどまで魔軍に支配されていた町　ピーハンデル","translatedEnglishLine":"That town, Pihandel, was under demon army control until just a short while ago."},{"lineNumber":252523,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが魔物兵を倒しておっぱらったので、隠れたいた住民が出てきます。","translatedEnglishLine":"Because Rance defeated and drove away the monster soldiers, the hiding residents are coming out."},{"lineNumber":252524,"originalJapaneseLine":"住民は殺されてもおらずにみんな無事、ゆうに魔物に抵抗はしてなかった","translatedEnglishLine":"The residents were not killed and are all safe; they simply did not resist the monsters."},{"lineNumber":252525,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物は怖かったが、さからわない限り安全は保証された。","translatedEnglishLine":"They were afraid of the monsters, but as long as they didn’t resist, their safety was guaranteed."},{"lineNumber":252526,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物達は我々にこういった、ゼスの身分制度を復活させる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The monsters told us this: they will restore the Zeth caste system."},{"lineNumber":252527,"originalJapaneseLine":"優秀な者からＡ級、Ｂ級、Ｃ級と分ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"From the competent they categorize into A class, B class, and C class."},{"lineNumber":252528,"originalJapaneseLine":"この町にいた魔法使い、学者、先生などかしこい者はみんなＡ級、Ｂ級候補として","translatedEnglishLine":"The magicians, scholars, teachers, and other intelligent people from this town were all taken as candidates for A and B class."},{"lineNumber":252529,"originalJapaneseLine":"連れていかれたよ、残った俺達はＣ級だってさ","translatedEnglishLine":"They were taken away; the ones left behind like us are C class, they said."},{"lineNumber":252530,"originalJapaneseLine":"　連れていかれたのは、この先にある　町　ルールーハンデル","translatedEnglishLine":"The ones taken were taken to the town ahead, Ruluhandel."},{"lineNumber":252531,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんかやる気のない者達ばかり残っています。アホっぽい、無気力ぽい","translatedEnglishLine":"Only people without motivation remain. They seem stupid and listless."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、それはウルザがなんとかすると言っていたぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, Urza said he would do something about it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの子がなんとかすると言っているんだ、大丈夫だろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That kid said he’d handle it, so it should be fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連絡が来るまで、少しでも魔物を減らしておくか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until we get word, let’s try to reduce the number of monsters as much as we can.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とランスは出かける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And with that, Rance sets out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：ゼス平原／危険or戦場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Zeth Plains / Danger or Battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はスリミドの南西、サンデー平原に来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and his group had arrived at the Sunday Plains, southwest of Surimido.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、ゼス主力軍と魔軍が１番激しく戦っている戦場だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the battlefield where the Zeth main forces and the demon army are fighting most fiercely right now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここにハニー達数万が魔軍側で参加してきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, tens of thousands of the Honeys have joined on the demon army’s side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場は混戦状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battlefield is in a chaotic state.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カバッハーン、サイアス、ウスピラが戦っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kabahan, Saius, and Uspira were fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに毛利軍も参加している、ハニーは我々に任せろ、割りまくるぜと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moreover, the Mouri army is also participating; the Honeys said, 'Leave it to us, we’ll break through like crazy.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、よーし、俺達も参加するぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance: Alright, let’s join in too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱ、ハニーより魔物将軍を倒す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After all, it’s better to defeat the monster generals than the Honeys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうですね、ランス様は敵のボスを倒していかないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s right, Lord Rance has to defeat the enemy bosses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーは割ってもオマケが無いからな、魔物将軍は割ったら女の子がくくくく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if you break through the Honeys, there’s no extra reward; but if you defeat a monster general, you get girls, hehe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー軍の陣地を発見
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Discovered the Honey army’s camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はにーほー、魔軍と協力して人間をいじめるのだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honey-ho, cooperating with the demon army to bully humans!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いじめるのだー、可哀想な娘・・うひひ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bullying them—poor girls... uhehe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争を楽しい遊びみたいに考えているハニー達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honeys think of war like a fun game.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、あいかわらずよくわからん連中だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, they’re still a bunch I just don’t understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒しておくか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s take them down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [Battle]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっ、アタリ付き発見！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, found one with a prize!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍、ランスの事を知らない、わざわざやられに来たか人間どもめ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster Great General: Don’t know who Rance is, huh? Did you come all the way here just to get killed, humans?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、隊列もバラバラ、服装や装備もバラバラ、お前ら正規軍ではなく野良の傭兵か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, your formation is messy, your clothes and equipment are all over the place. You’re not regular troops but some stray mercenaries?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やめておけ、お前らでは私の相手にはならぬぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Better stop. You’re no match for me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふん、俺様のオーラが見えぬとはランクの低い奴だな、まぁいいひとつ聞こう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, not being able to see my aura means you’re low rank. Well, fine, let me ask you one thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の腹に入っている女の子は美人か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is the girl inside your belly a beautiful one?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、頭脳として入れている人間の事か、そんなのしらんわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? You mean the human I have inside as my brain? I don’t know anything about that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁ、いい、割れば分かるか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, fine. I’ll find out once I break you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [Battle]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、ここはハニー達の陣地か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, this is the Honeys’ camp...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂は、ハニーキングが第一の盟友、関羽
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am the Honey King’s foremost ally, Guan Yu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーはごっこ遊びが好きなので、三国志ごっこ風でもいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Honeys like dress-up play, so playing Three Kingdoms style is fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、別になんでもいいです、好きにやって・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it doesn’t really matter, just do as you like...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で戦闘になります。（ここ　ハニーの将軍クラスです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then battle begins. (Here they are Honey-class generals.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [Battle]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれ、どうしたのですか、戦場から離れてしまいましたよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? What’s wrong? You’ve left the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、飽きた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I’m bored.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人もいる訳じゃないし、俺で無いと駄目だという話でもないしな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s no demon god here, and it’s not like I’m the only one who can do this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんかやる気はなくなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ve just lost my motivation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな勝手な・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s so selfish...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーども見ていたら、なんというか真面目に戦うのがバカバカしくなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Watching those Honeys, somehow fighting seriously feels ridiculous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはわかりますが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand that, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どっちにしろあの戦場に魔物大将軍ツォトンはいない感じだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Either way, it seems the monster great general Tsoton is not on that battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう少し奥地を調べてみよう、いくぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s investigate a little farther inland. Let’s go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [After Battle]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物軍はランス達に負けて逃げて行った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster army lost to Rance and his group and retreated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは、俺様の勝利だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha, that’s my victory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうに町がありますよ、よってみよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s a town over there. Let’s stop by.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこは、ついさきほどまで魔軍に支配されていた町　ピーハンデル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That town, Pihandel, was under demon army control until just a short while ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが魔物兵を倒しておっぱらったので、隠れたいた住民が出てきます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because Rance defeated and drove away the monster soldiers, the hiding residents are coming out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 住民は殺されてもおらずにみんな無事、ゆうに魔物に抵抗はしてなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The residents were not killed and are all safe; they simply did not resist the monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物は怖かったが、さからわない限り安全は保証された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were afraid of the monsters, but as long as they didn’t resist, their safety was guaranteed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達は我々にこういった、ゼスの身分制度を復活させる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters told us this: they will restore the Zeth caste system.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 優秀な者からＡ級、Ｂ級、Ｃ級と分ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the competent they categorize into A class, B class, and C class.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この町にいた魔法使い、学者、先生などかしこい者はみんなＡ級、Ｂ級候補として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The magicians, scholars, teachers, and other intelligent people from this town were all taken as candidates for A and B class.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連れていかれたよ、残った俺達はＣ級だってさ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were taken away; the ones left behind like us are C class, they said.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連れていかれたのは、この先にある　町　ルールーハンデル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ones taken were taken to the town ahead, Ruluhandel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんかやる気のない者達ばかり残っています。アホっぽい、無気力ぽい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only people without motivation remain. They seem stupid and listless.
